attributes.action: Stop free health care to non british citizens/nationals and reduce the strain on the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make vistor to the UK responsible for the cost of medical care they may require whilst visiting the UK, in the same way that British Nationals must take responsibility for the cost of their own health care when abroad,(through travel insurance, etc). Thus reducing the strain on the NHS and creating a more efficient service for the British public.
